entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Grand Forks
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1400 metres. Fog patches dissipating near noon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Rain beginning overnight except wet snow over higher terrain. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to 800 metres overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wet snow over higher terrain early in the morning. Snow level 800 metres rising to 1200 metres near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
